headline: MGM Stock Is Rising. Its Online Betting Venture Raised Guidance.
summary: Shares of  MGM Resorts International  spiked Monday after BetMGM, the U.S. sports-betting and iGaming venture owned jointly by MGM and  Entain  lifted its fiscal-year guidance.  BetMGM said in a news release Monday that the company’s positive momentum in the first quarter of the year—when it reported 34% net revenue growth from the prior year—continued in the second quarter.  Shares of MGM Resorts surged 8.3% to $34.38 following the news.

Shares of MGM Resorts surged 8.3% to $34.38 following the news.

headline: CoreWeave downgrade, Circle, MGM Resorts rises on BetMGM outlook
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal tracks today's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. CoreWeave (CRWV) was downgraded by Bank of America to Neutral from Buy, citing the company's valuation and debt. Circle (CRCL) stock is soaring, hitting new highs. The stock is up about 400% since its initial public offering (IPO). MGM Resorts (MGM) stock is climbing after sports-betting joint venture BetMGM raised its full-year outlook. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: VF Corp, MGM Resorts, PENN Entertainment, Hims & Hers Health, and Camping World Shares Are Soaring, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks jumped in the afternoon session after the major indices rebounded (Nasdaq +1.5%, S&P 500 +1.0%) as reports pointed to easing tensions between Israel and Iran.

headline: BetMGM Raises Guidance As It Underscores This Trend; Casino Stocks Jump
summary: MGM Resorts International and other casino stocks rallied Monday after the company's BetMGM venture raised its guidance.  Positive momentum in the first quarter is carrying over to the current quarter, a statement from the sports betting and online gaming provider said.  Citing "increased confidence in its performance for 2025," BetMGM now expects full-year net revenue of at least $2.6 billion.

headline: MGM Resorts International Stock Rises on Lifted BetMGM Outlook
summary: MGM Resorts International shares surged Monday as the casino operator and London-traded firm Entain lifted their full-year outlook for their co-owned BetMGM sports betting and iGaming operator.
